data.eml:eml: Giesbertiolus curoei, a new species of flower chafer from Panama with transitional characters (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Cetoniinae: Trichiini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramírez-Ponce, Andrés (2014): Giesbertiolus curoei, a new species of flower chafer from Panama with transitional characters (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Cetoniinae: Trichiini). Zootaxa 3795 (5): 557-563, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3795.5.4
